name: Happy Paint: Color by Number
description:
Feel tired and get bored of numerous daily trifles?
Want to release stress?
Come on, Happy Paint is the best choice for you to get relaxed and stay away from anxiety!
Download and open this brand new coloring by number art book, choose your favorite pics and start coloring! Rediscover the simple relaxation and joy of coloring.

Don't worry if you don't have any art skill!
Happy paint provides a simply way to create pixel art masterpieces for all pics are marked by numbers.
How to play：
- Double finger to zoom in and zoom out the coloring pictures.
- Long press to color continuously which make coloring and drawing more easily.
Coloring has never been so easy, everyone can become an outstanding artist in Happy Paint, try it now!


Premium Subscriptions:
Premium Subscription is a paid subscription that allows you to unlock unlimited pictures, no ads and night mode.

- Premium subscriptions are from $2.99 USD weekly, $9.99 USD monthly and $49.99 USD annually, we also offer 3 days free trial then $2.99 weekly.
- Payment will be charged to iTunes Account at confirmation of purchase.
- Subscription will be automatically renewed for the same price and duration period, auto-renew can be turned off at least 24 hours before the end of the current period.
- Subscriptions may be managed by the user and auto-renewal may be turned off by going to the user's iTunes Account Settings after purchase. This must be done 24 hours before the end of the subscription period to avoid being charged.
- No cancellation of the current subscription is allowed during the active subscription period.
- Any unused portion of a free trial period, if offered, will be forfeited when the user purchases a subscription to that publication, where applicable

Premium Subscription Features:
- Unlimited access to all pictures
- No ads
- Night Mode

Premium Subscription FAQs:
What happens to the unlocked content after the subscription expires?
After the subscription expires, all paid images (premium subscription images) which users have already colored during subscription will be accessible. However other images would be locked for renewable.
